PROJECTS TAKEN.Description:
Description
• App that can store thumbnails and links to my favorite movies. 
• User can create new movie titles, delete movies and search for movies.

Deployment
• Regularly made commits to GitHub.
• Pushed the app to Heroku using Git

Description
• This blog app allows users to create accounts, create and delete blog posts.
• Comments can only be posted when a user logs into his/her account.
• Markdown and syntax highlighting enabled.

Deployment
• Regularly pushed the code to GitHub. 
• Used git checkout and merge to make changes to branches and merge with master.
• Pushed the app to Heroku using Git.

Description
• To Do List App using Anvil Works and Python.
• User can add, delete or mark as completed to do list items. 
• User can edit the item name and a brief description. 
• Completed items automatically move to the Completed Tasks section of the app.

Deployment
• The app is coded in the browser with Python. 
• The app is also hosted with Anvil Works
